sentences.en: A wooden plank bridged the stream.
sentences.cn: 一块木板跨越小溪之上为桥.

sentences.en: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentences.cn: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

sentences.en: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克放下第一块厚木板，把它钉在合适的位置上。 。

sentences.en: He marked off six feet on the plank.
sentences.cn: 他在厚木板上6英尺处加了标记.

sentences.en: Ku prattled away, even dragging in the bed plank incident.
sentences.cn: 顾尔谦还唠唠叨叨地牵涉适才床板的事.

sentences.en: Negotiation of the single - plank bridge was difficult for me.
sentences.cn: 要走过这座独木桥对我是件难事.

sentences.en: The carpenter is planing away at a plank.
sentences.cn: 木工在使劲刨一块木板.

sentences.en: The carpenter shaved off the rough corners of the plank.
sentences.cn: 木匠把木板的粗角刨平.

sentences.en: The old man scraped his bare feet on the plank floor.
sentences.cn: 老人在厚厚的地板上擦了一下他那双光着的脚.

sentences.en: The plank fell on the ground with a thump.
sentences.cn: 砰的一声,木板倒下来了.

sentences.en: The plank was set against the wall.
There remained a rude table here -- a plank on two posts.
sentences.cn: 这里还留着一张异常粗糙的桌子 -- 是用两条杆子支着一块木板做成的.

sentences.en: They intend to win the next election on the plank of developing trade.
sentences.cn: 他们想以发展贸易的纲领来赢得下次选举.

sentences.en: We use a plank to cross the ditch.
sentences.cn: 我们用一块木板过了沟.

sentences.en: With one blow he drove the nail into the plank.
sentences.cn: 他一锤便将钉子钉入木板.

phrases.tran_cn: 走跳板（旧时被海盗逼迫蒙着眼在船舷外的一块木板上行走直至坠海身亡）

trans.tran_en: a long narrow piece of wooden board, used especially for making structures to walk on
to cover or provide (an area) with planks
